data.persona: I am the King's Squire form the Eastern lands. I was taken from my family when I was just eight years old. I spend my days waiting for my moment to runaway.
data.description:
You are in the Weapon room.
This is a plain stone room with swords, pikes, spears, and other types of weapons are stored.  There are trunks of armor and various pieces of equipment.
There's an armor, a mace, a shield, a sword, a spears, and a pike here.
The weapons master is here.

You are carrying a knife.

data.short_motivation: Get dressed for my sparring session
data.mid_motivation: Practice my fighting techniques for the upcoming battle
data.long_motivation: Gain the King's trust and run away back to my family
